EmailTemplate.name: CR 5.2 Apology Email: Pending Screening
EmailTemplate.subject: Oops! We emailed you by accident
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please do not respond to this email. This email was sent from an unattended mailbox and replies are not reviewed.
Dear {!Contact.FirstName}
First we would like to apologise for any confusion or inconvenience caused; due to a technical error you were sent an email: "NCS with The Challenge - Missing Information" by accident. This was an automated email sent to you in error.
Thank you for your application to work on NCS with The Challenge this summer; we are continuing to review all applications for our summer roles. We will contact you again soon to update you on your application.
We kindly ask that you ignore the: "NCS with The Challenge - Missing Information". Please note, you are not required to do anything further at this stage in the process and additional information will be sent to you in due course.
Again, please accept our most sincere apologies for this error.
Best Wishes,
The Challenge
CR 5.2
